titleStmt.title: A sermon preached in S. Andrew's Church, Dublin, on the 5th of November, 1698. Being the anniversary thanksgiving for the deliverance from the Gun-Powder-Treason plot, in England, in the year 1605. Before the honourable the House of Commons. / By Mr. William Jephson, Dean of Lismore.
titleStmt.author: Jephson, William, Dean of Lismore, fl. 1698.

titleStmt.title: A sermon preached in S. Andrew's Church, Dublin, on the 5th of November, 1698. Being the anniversary thanksgiving for the deliverance from the Gun-Powder-Treason plot, in England, in the year 1605. Before the honourable the House of Commons. / By Mr. William Jephson, Dean of Lismore.
titleStmt.author: Jephson, William, Dean of Lismore, fl. 1698.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook, printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty ...,

notesStmt.note: Order to print dated: Lunæ 7⁰ die Novembris, 1698. Signed: Tho. Tilson Cler. Parl. Dom. Com.
Reproduction of the original in the Trinity College Library.
